CustomField.description: External ID field that unequivocally identifies some configurable PLT Object records to prevent record duplication. If left blank, it's automatically completed by a Workflow Rule which concatenes the following: ORG ID + Record ID.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: External ID field that unequivocally identifies some configurable PLT Object records to prevent record duplication. If left blank, it's automatically completed by a Workflow Rule which concatenes the following: ORG ID + Record ID.
CustomField.label: External ID
